mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AT_SYS_MODEL( TREE_ID, MENU_CODE, M_NAME, M_DESC, IS_SYSTEM, CATEGORY, IS_CON_SHOWNUM, CONTROL_NUM, CONTROL_PAGE, SHOW_INDEX, REMARK ) VALUES( #{treeId}, #{menuCode}, #{mname}, #{mdesc}, #{isSystem}, #{category}, #{isConShownum}, #{controlNum}, #{controlPage}, #{showIndex}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.ID as id, TREE_ID as treeId, MENU_CODE as menuCode, M_NAME as mname, M_DESC as mdesc, IS_SYSTEM as isSystem, CATEGORY as category, IS_CON_SHOWNUM as isConShownum, CONTROL_NUM as controlNum, CONTROL_PAGE as controlPage, SHOW_INDEX as showIndex, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_SYS_MODEL c WHERE c.ID=#{id}

SELECT c.ID as id, TREE_ID as treeId, MENU_CODE as menuCode, M_NAME as mname, M_DESC as mdesc, IS_SYSTEM as isSystem, CATEGORY as category, IS_CON_SHOWNUM as isConShownum, CONTROL_NUM as controlNum, CONTROL_PAGE as controlPage, SHOW_INDEX as showIndex, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_SYS_MODEL c ORDER BY showIndex

SELECT c.ID as id, TREE_ID as treeId, MENU_CODE as menuCode, M_NAME as mname, M_DESC as mdesc, IS_SYSTEM as isSystem, CATEGORY as category, IS_CON_SHOWNUM as isConShownum, CONTROL_NUM as controlNum, CONTROL_PAGE as controlPage, SHOW_INDEX as showIndex, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_SYS_MODEL c where c.TREE_ID = #{treeId} ORDER BY showIndex

select l.ID as id, l.TREE_ID as treeId, l.MENU_CODE as menuCode, l.M_NAME as mname, l.M_DESC as mdesc, l.IS_SYSTEM as isSystem, l.CATEGORY as category, l.IS_CON_SHOWNUM as isConShownum, l.CONTROL_NUM as controlNum, l.CONTROL_PAGE as controlPage, l.SHOW_INDEX as showIndex, l.CREATE_TIME as createTime, l.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, l.REMARK as remark from AT_SYS_MODEL l,AT_HOLD_FUNCTION f WHERE f.ACTOR_ID = #{userId} and f.MENU_CODE = l.MENU_CODE and l.SHOW_INDEX is null
